effect.text: Remove all damage counters from all of your own Pokémon with damage counters on them, then discard all Energy cards attached to those Pokémon.

cost.description: Discard all Energy from all Pokemon that were healed

tips: Only use when you have multiple damaged Pokemon and the healing is critical
Try to move Energy to undamaged Pokemon before using Pokemon Center
Best in control/stall decks that can afford the tempo loss
Excellent in Venusaur decks with Energy Trans to preserve Energy
Avoid using when you need to maintain offensive pressure
In most decks, this card is too slow and costly to be worth including

rulings.ruling: You must remove damage counters from ALL of your Pokemon that have damage counters on them
You cannot choose to heal only some of your Pokemon - the effect is mandatory for all damaged Pokemon
After removing all damage counters, you must discard ALL Energy cards attached to those Pokemon
Pokemon without damage counters are not affected and keep their Energy
If a Pokemon has damage counters but no Energy attached, it is still fully healed
All types of Energy cards must be discarded (Basic Energy and Special Energy like Double Colorless Energy)
The healing happens first, then Energy is discarded
This does not affect your opponent's Pokemon
